select (select ifnull(sum(money),0) from t_income where DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{time},'%Y-%m-%d')) as 'inMoney', (select ifnull(sum(money),0) from t_outcome where DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{time},'%Y-%m-%d')) as 'outMoney', (select ifnull(sum(money),0) from t_income) as 'allInMoney', (select ifnull(sum(money),0) from t_outcome) as 'allOutMoney', (select ifnull(sum(area),0) from t_house) as 'sumArea', (select ifnull(sum(area),0) from t_house where id in(select house_id from t_rent_pay where master_id=#{id})) as 'area', (select ifnull(scale,0) from t_contract_master where id=#{id}) as 'rentPayScale', (select fact_pay_time_start from t_rent_pay where master_id=#{id} limit 1) as 'startTime', (select count(id) from t_rent_pay where master_id=#{id}) as 'cnt', DATE_FORMAT(#{time},'%Y年%m月%d日') as 'nowTime'
from t_rent_pay;
select h.title as text,h.id from t_rent_pay t left join t_hotel h on h.id=t.hotel_id where t.master_id=#{id}

select (select count(house_id) from t_rent_pay where master_id=#{id} and hotel_id=#{hotelId}) as 'houseCount', (select sum(area) from t_rent_pay where master_id=#{id} and hotel_id=#{hotelId}) as 'sumArea' from t_rent_pay where 1=1 and hotel_id=#{hotelId}
select card_title,area from t_house where id = (select house_id from t_rent_pay where master_id=#{id} and hotel_id=#{hotelId})

select t.pay_type,t.fact_pay_time_start,t.fact_pay_time_end,h.card_title as 'houseName',DATE_FORMAT(t.pay_period_start,'%d') as 'payDay' from t_rent_pay t left join t_house h on t.house_id=h.id where t.master_id=#{id}
